name: Krampus Chase
description:
The evil Krampus has stolen all the Christmas presents! Help Santa catch up with him and bring Christmas back!

We are a beginner team of three people. Krampus Chase is our first game made for a student game development competition. The task of the competition was to make a Christmas runner. The source of inspiration for us was the Crypt of the NecroDancer game, we used the same mechanics of performing actions to the rhythm of the music.

We will be glad if you play our game and leave feedback.

Our team:

Helen Goncharenko - Mentor

Ilya Ulybyshev - Gamedesign, Sound

Julia Demina - Art

Alexandr Pashkovskiy - Code
